categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Trooper Project
Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Mission to Anteevy was a mission in the Galactic Civil War in which a major Phase II dark trooper factory, Imperial Robotics Construction Facility Ice Station Beta was destroyed.
Arriving from Cal-Seti tracing a smuggler ship, Kyle Katarn slipped into the facility. He used the glaciers pouring into the complex to his advantage, and planted 3 charges in the installation.

As he made his escape, a new Phase II dark trooper intercepted him and engaged him in a duel. The two exchanged fire, and the dark trooper fell to Katarn's fire. After facing several Phase I dark troopers during his exfiltration, he escaped the complex in the Moldy Crow. The complex exploded into a huge ball of fire, engulfing the factory and the rest of the stormtroopers in the area.

In the game Dark Forces, a secret area of the map for this mission consists of a hidden cave shaped like the head of the rabbit Max. While only the head's outline is shown on the map when the player discovers the cave, if he enters the LACDS cheat code, eyes, nose and mouth will become visible.
